Summary: I saw something that looked like a flying arrow
divs: sighting detailsi was oustide playing with my 2 year old son when i heard a sound that soundedlike a strange plane sound. it sounded like a cross between a lawn mower,helicopter and small plane. i looked up and saw it flying towards the santaclara valley area, it looked like a flying arrow. i was shocked because i hadnot seen anything like that before. it flew very fast so i only got to see itfor a few seconds. i drew a picture of it and put it athttp:\\www.lothlorien.com\egret\plane.jpg. is this ufo an experimental aircraftthat is known? it sort of looked like a rocket...
